content.detailedDescription:
I was looking east from 10 mile and gratiot area looking for perseid shooting stars.  i saw what looked like a satellite, it was small, i would guess 15+ miles away, appeared high in altitude at about 45 degrees elevation, though no trees or anything to compare size to.  it looked to be moving at least as fast as a jet and perhaps as fast as a satellite but looked a little oblong or bullet shaped. i say satellite because i have seen satellites on several occasions and the color yellow relflected and size shape and movement were similar to a satellite in orbit.    i started wondering if it was a ufo and suddenly the craft began to slow down to approx 1/4 speed and it started increasing in intensity until it was by far the brightest thing in the sky and very white and looked round.  the brightness would be equivalent to one of those whitish bright headlamps on brights setting at one block away.  the color was the same color as a large meteor burning up through the atmosphere, a brilliant white, which i have seen on several occasions.  then the craft turned down or off the bright white color and it was dim yellow again as it started gaining speed back to the original speed. i had binoculars with me and quickly looked at the ufo.  it appeared slightly bullet shaped and by the time it had reached north northeast it was too far away to see with binoculars. if it was above 35,000 feet it was moving much faster than a passenger jet, at least 5 times as fast. i dont know what could be that small at a lower altitude, but it would have to be smaller than a passenger plane.  there was no sound, very little wind.  there were no clouds in the sky to the entire east during the sighting.  the perseids were pretty disappointing since i only saw four decent meteors, but i did see a couple other small shooting stars as well as the moons of jupiter.

it was not a meteor because it slowed down - got bright - sped up- all in a straight line tangent to the atmosphere
content.summary: Dim yellow object turning very bright white  back to dim yellow

content.detailedDescription:
Visitor submitted ufo sightings

name:	graham

email:	truthseekertruthlover@yahoo.Com

date:	2007-08-13

time:	01:00:00

weather:	bright clear starry clear. warm.

duration:	1am - 6am

country:	united kingdom

region:	telscombe cliffs sussex u.K.

orientation:	facing directly west, most of the objects tended to travel from the south directly north. sometimes they just sit or hover directly north or directly south.

number of ufos:	7

height:	variable

size:	half thumb

number of witnesses:	1

details:
i have been seeing e.T.V. / u.F.O.'s for many years . however this year especially since march the number and frequency of sightings has caused me to report these events. this week 13/08/07 i even filmed them on my camcorder. you can see it here. feel free to download it.

http://www.Archive.Org/details/e.T.V.U.F.O.August13th2007

the weird thing was the lamp / lights. i have never seen them this bright. instead of looking like street lights they looked like mini stars, flaring sort of. and i missed at least 3 other flyby. as soon as i put the camera down they flew past again. the orbs were huge at least 3 of them. the triangles were amazing really low. i got two filmed but typically the lowest & best i didn't get to in time as the battery was on charge. also as i said before there was some kind on membrane either side of the street i can see it but i'm not sure if it will be on the video. the only analogy i can think of is the look of the liquid you blow bubbles with combined with t.V.Static. this membrane sort of vibrates and runs the length of the street both sides behind the neighbours house. i'm thinking this could be some sort of shield so that other people in the town can't see the vehicles or it could be an opening into another dimension or even a shield from the prying eyes of military satellites. now i think it was all of the above.

as you will hear from the tape there is little sound.Only a few slowed jets noises.The birds are silent and here seagulls are never silent. the neighbors behind were in the garden drinking and chatting. they were oblivious.

the noise of the coast road which normally has taxis on sounded literally like out of a sci-fi movie. the sound of a space ship. these sounds precede the filming. in fact that is how i know they are coming. i always here these very very slowed down jet noises. but they are not jets more just like a slowed down video tape or sci-fi effect.

i'm not used to the camera so i zoomed in and out a bit to start with. but there is over 13 minutes so far. i could have got at least a couple of hours but my camera is 7 years old and the battery needs charging often.

anyway here is the link for the full 13 minutes of video footage. the best part is after 6 minutes, however i would suggest watching the whole thing first time.

as an intelligent person i can assure you these are not commercial or private aircraft or helicopters. the u.K. has very strict rules regarding flights over urban & suburban areas. the speed of these vehicles is very slow only as long as i am observing them. the seem to continue to the horizon where they vanish. they vehicles always appear in an instant. the triangular ships also have morphing or cloaking capabilities. i have not been able to confirm whether they are the same as the orbs or whether they are the same. perhaps there is another larger mother ship nearby disguised as blue sky i would never know.

the police helicopter is possible at the end although i didn't hear it. often when these sightings occur the police helicopter or the coast guard helicopter turn up. living on the coast i hear & see these all the time. i didn't hear them or see them. the footage is of the ufos . the first piece of footage could have been two hours long. i observed it for more than two hours. i didn't film it because i just didn't have the battery's charged. there's no way a helicopter is going to sit above my neighbours house hovering for two hours or more in silence !!! however sometimes these e.T.V.S turn on their sides flip over charge shape completely & even morph. so i'm not sure. all i know is that since i reported this incident the sky has been sprayed very heavily with chemtrails up to 8 aircraft just last night. now we have gone from warm 80 degree heat to winter weather in less than 24 hours. its raining / flooding again and very windy. of course this also means no one is going to look at the sky and watch ufos.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs & triangles

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were watching the evening news when the weather man said that there is going to be a meteor shower visable tonight. curious, we when out and sat in our driveway watching the sky for meteors. after about 10 min. we spotted several meteors then we both noticed two small star like objects moving slowly toward each other, when they met they stopped moving for a few seconds then one of the objects seem to moved off in a 90 degree angle from its orignal path and the other one seemed to vanish. the objects were too high to be aircraft i thought maybe it was a satilight but after witnessing the strange pause and change in direction i discounted that idea. about three seconds after the first one vanished the second one seemed to vanish as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two wierd star like object high in the sky changing direction then vanishing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at an airliner going from west to east. seen a big bright lite way above it so i shot it with my sony dh5. it was on the same course as the airliner going from seattle to denver.
 the sun was setting and it was a cleair night.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: This is the strangest thing my boyfriend and i have ever seen. he is a total skeptic, and was shocked by this object. we were looking up for the meteor showers, and up above orion was this very strange looking ufo. it changed from a circular shape to a triangular shape to even a square shape...I am an amateur astronomer, i have never seen this...I was frightened. it appeared to be very large, very massive, very high. it was black with lights outlining it, and it had a circular light outline in the middle of it. we watched it for quite awhile, it darted up and down but basically stayed in the same vicinity. when we first watched it, we thought it was a phenomena of the meteor shower, but it makes no sense...I really have never seen anything of this nature.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Strange, very odd, kept changing shape

content.detailedDescription:
I saw dancing lights in the sky over the cornfields. they looked like they were playing a game of leapfrog. they were making maneuvers that, if not regulated by an inertial damper, would turn an ordinary human to jelly on the back wall. then one of the lights shot off to the south at a near unimaginable speed (at least 5 to 7 times, or more, faster the the old concorde planes could do). then that light shot straight up at what i can only describe a ftl or faster than light speeds into space.

needless to say i was shocked! i felt i couldn't tell anyone or make a police report because of possible ridicule. i did, however, tell one friend and he made light of it by sayin, and i quote, "lookout! here come the mib's! (men in black)"

it was only recently as i just heard about mufon, that i felt comfortable about telling someone about it.

thank you for your time.
--
scott

p.S.
unfortunately, i didn't have my camera at the time, so i have no pictures to post.
content.summary: Dancing lights

content.detailedDescription:
On february 19th, 2005, at approximately 9:45 p.M. i had just finished work, and was driving in a westerly direction going home. i was approx. 3 miles from my home when i noticed something, a "greenish colored star", way up in the sky in the south west. i honestly do not know what made me notice it more than any other star in the sky that night, but it just looked different. i kept looking up as i was driving. there were a few cars on the road that night, but they all turned off shortly after i turned onto the road to my house. i was alone on the road. i kept looking at that "star", and suddenly when i was probably one and a half miles from home, the "star" went from the southwest sky, from the size and appearance of a star, to directly ahead of me, going across the highway, in about 3 seconds!!!!!!!!This triangular object had a brilliant greenish white laserlight on the tail. brighter than anything you have ever seen. it made no sound at all at any time....It went across the road about perhaps 15 feet above the road and landed in a field next to a grove of trees, with the laserlight glowing the whole time. the object was about mabey 60 or so feet across, and 100 feet long. a triangular shape, with a sort of rounded nose. the shape was triangular, but with the wings rounded sort of. there were no markings except for lines, deep grooves running diagnally under the craft. round green glowing lights were spaced evenly under the craft next to the lines. no other markings were on the craft. when it came down and went across the road, i was petrified. i floored the gas and put my car into reverse and went backwards, i don't know how far. then i stopped. i saw the craft slowly rise up and turn slowly and stop and just hover atop the trees. the greenish white laser was on the entire time it performed this maneuver. the trees were perhaps 60-70' high. i did not know what to do. i could'nt think. i did not have my radio on at the time, but just a cd playing. i shut it off after i slowly pulled into a driveway, and turned my light off. my car didnt malfunction. i sat without breathing or moving and watched out my window/sunroof in my car. i did not have a cell phone at the time. the object shut off the laser light after it turned and lifted to the tree line. it hovered there for awhile, and then began to slowly move to where i was parked. i was parked mabey 30 feet away from the tree line. it moved so it was directly above me and stopped. i was losing my mind, i couldnt believe this was happening. i didnt know if i would see my family again. i was afraid they would see me. i did not move. i thought that anything that could move that fast, and never make a sound could do anything they wanted to. they were directly above me and stone still. the green lights beneath it were on. then it started to move slowly after about 15 minutes, and headed out across the field toward the northeast. it was about 40 feet off the ground. the color of the object was a solid dark brown/black color. it was smooth. no dents or markings, rounded wings. i waited about, i don't know, 15 minutes before i could move, and drove like a bat out of hell home. one month to the day of that incident, i had a heart attack. i was 48 years old, with no history of any cardiac problems, no cholestorol or bp issues. i couldnt sleep for a whole month.



"
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a triangular shaped craft on feb. 19th, 2005, it made no noise and came down from the sky in about 3 seconds. it went from literally a greenish white star to directly in front of me in 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving north on i-17 to return home to flagstaff.  we had dropped my father off at the econo lodge near the airport earlier that evening, as his flight left the next morning.  we had dinner about an hour and a half before at the p.F. chang's in scottsdale.  my father and i had water, my wife had literally two swallows of a gin and tonic (which i scolded her for, since she was wasting it by not drinking it).  it was a fairly clear night, as we saw several meteors later in the evening while driving home.

a mile or so before cold creek canyon, my wife and i seemingly both looked to the east side of the highway, approximately 100 feet up, at the exact same moment.  there was no reason for me to look in that direction, as i was driving.  there was nothing for a second, but then, suddenly, a very bright light blue sphere of light, about dime sized, going straight down.  the light only lasted for one second.

my wife only saw one sphere of light.  i saw two distinct spheres.  firstly, a smaller sphere appeared about of nowhere, then disappeared, then reappeared at a slightly lower altitude about four times as large as the original.

the light was very bright, but not blinding.  if we had been closer, however, it would have blinded us.  the shade of blue was very light, not as bright a blue as xenon headlights.  the center of the sphere was bright white, fading into the light blue.

the light itself appeared very suddenly and disappeared suddenly, as if a light switch was flipped.

since the object was only visible for a second, we had no time to analyze it until after the fact.

car?  no, much too large, going straight toward the ground.  too bright.  helicopter?  no.  too steady, again going straight toward the ground.  no other lights were visible.
fireworks?  no.  no flare effect, fading, arc, or sound.  again, it was like a switch was flipped.  the light was there, then it wasn't.
meteor?  no.  trajectory, lack of sound or crash, and sudden appearance and disappearance of the object argue against this.

the sighting was over so quickly that our reaction was confusion, since it wasn't immediately identifiable as something "normal."  i was amazed at how large and bright it was, and my wife said "what the hell was that?" after it disappeared.  a short while later i regretted not stopping the car and pulling over to see if we could see anything else.
content.summary: Falling light blue sphere.

content.detailedDescription: We were out looking for the perseids meteor shower, we saw toward the south west a very bright object appeared, almos like a star, moving very slowly and dimming out as it moved towards the north.  we saw it tracked it until we no longer had visual contact with it.  lasted about two and a helf minutes. it was not a meteor i know what they look like. no tail . no burning behind it just a light moving across the sky. very strange. a ufo. right after we saw it there was an outburts of air, cool air coming from norht to south that seem to come out of no where. the air was maybe in the 60's range.  there was not a cloud in sight for miles. so we though that was very unusual. the air flow lasted for about 5 minutes and then quit , there was dead silence after that. the air resemble the down draft right before a thunder storm is approaching. very strange.
content.summary: Very bright object moving acroos sky from south to north , dimming out as it moved and dissapears.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i live in nipomo, california, a rural area south of pismo beach - about half way between los angeles and san francisco. shortly after 9 pm pdt last night (070812) we drove to a remote area free of city lights to look for meteors from the perseid shower.  it was early in the shower's duration but we saw a few.  we also noticed some high altitude aircraft flying in various directions in the sky.  that they were aircraft was evidenced by the wing lights and strobes.

at about 9:40 am as we stared up looking for more meteors we saw a round, star-like light begin to traverse the sky from the south southeast to the north northwest.  it seemed to be much higher than the aircraft we observed and we saw no wing lights or strobes.  it also appeared to be moving much faster than the aircraft we had already seen.  at first i thought it might have been a satellite.  but as we watched we both were aware of the fact that the trajectory of the object was not smooth (as satellites appear).  rather, it was jerky and zig-zagged along its path.  we followed the light across the sky until it disappeared over the horizon.

i wouldn't bother to report this sighting had it not been for the odd, herky-jerky character of its trajectory.

my friend is very pragmatic and quite skeptical regarding extra terrestrial craft but she could find no other explanation for the sighting than to admit that she felt she had seen her first ufo.
content.summary: During perseid shower, we observed light travelling southeast to northwest across sky in erratic trajectory.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just before storm. i was walking out with my dog.From south-east came large clouds, it was also very loud (thunders out of stormy clouds on east). i was just going back to my blockhouse i live. from south-east i saw a black point flying fast just under clouds high above neighbour hous roof. first i though ahat i see large bird flying with big open wings. but speed of this flight was incrridable...I was trying to see if there is any kind of vertical like motion ( of wings) or any monouvers done by object, but not... it was going like on wire-straight ahad like sattelites in night sky. but it was light and storm was just coming.
object was dark(black), rather rectangular like. i was observig flight from south-east to north-west(west) direction. it took over 3-4 min of observation. in my opinion it wasn't a bird, perhaps aircraft, but it was no sound like and no stripe, any steam, any trail anythink what should be sign that it is an aircraft.... supersonic big bird???
content.summary: Object just under clouds bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to take a break and i saw what appeared to be 6 birds 'hovering' outside.  they just didn't seem like any birds i have ever seen.  the bodies were kind of fat white ovals and the wings were short stubby black and pointed forward.  they glinted in the sun and appeared to be made of metal.

they slowly moved away and immediately 2 white spheres moved in behind them and then changed into the bird things.  then they moved away as well.

well, as luck would have it and thank god for this, there was another worker on a scissor lift who saw the entire thing and verified it exactly as i have reported it.

why am i having so many sightings?  i don't understand.  is anyone else having sightings on a regular and daily basis?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 8 bird-like objects hovering outside over the field next to work

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to the truck to get something to drink.  then i saw what appeared to be a half-deflated mylar balloon or perhaps a white garbage bag floating in the air.  suddenly it expaned into a huge white disc and began doing slow graceful movements such as circles and zig-zags.  then another identical disc appeared and they did maneuvers together.  i called out to the other workers to come see the flying saucers, and immediately one of them took off and disappeared, while the other one turned on its side and appeared to change into a small plane and slowly move away.  the other workers came out and saw the 'airplane' and thought i was an idiot.  but i saw what i saw.

oh by the way.  there was another supervisor who was with me the entire time who saw everything and reported it to others in the same way.
content.summary: Two bright white discs over a field right outside work

content.detailedDescription: im a trucker who has believed in ufo's for a long time now, so whenever i'm driving i'm looking to spot something in the sky. i was racing to my girlfreinds fathers house after work trying to make it there before midnight on new years eve.It was just about 10-20 seconds into new years day when i spotted the three orbs, they did not seem to be moving. there were fireworks going off all around that area, but these glowing amber orbs were stationary. they were about as high as the fireworks if not higher directly above interstate 10 frwy just a couple miles east of the 57 frwy. i lost sight of them as i passed underneath them. i pulled into the slow lane and stuck my head out of the window and slowed down and looked directly up. it was as if they saw me, two of them stayed stationary the other started to descend towards my car. eyes back on the road i had to decide between between pulling over and speeding away. i told myself i sped away because i was already late for the party, but the truth is i remember being afraid of what might happen if i pulled over.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 glowing amber spheres

content.detailedDescription: The blue angels were putting on a show in seattle. they allways seem to pass over my house, so i was trying to get some photos. i was playing around with my digital camera and added an ir lens filter. there were no clouds and it was sunny and clear. as i was taking a series of photos, i could see nothing. but as i was viewing the photos something showed up. condensation maybe? no clouds and humidity was very low. you be the judge as i am reluctant to call it a ufo. i did try to duplicate the photo not five minuets later without success. some of my friends say it could be the goodyear blimp, but i should have seen it while i was taking the photo. others say i doctored it in photoshop. i did not in any way doctor the photo. two photos are attached. the first one was just lightened a little.
content.summary: Looks like a cloud till you zoom in.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the beggining of the meteor shower with my son a little after 10pm i'm guessing. we were laying down on our trampalene looking towards the north east. i saw what at first i assumed was a sattelite. i pointed it out to my son and he saw it too. we then noticed it was zig-zagging across the sky and not going straight. it was also pulsating. not blinking but slowly fading in and out. it was moving from south west to north. it was very high in the sky. almost looked like a star that was moving and pulsating. we suddenly did'nt see the object anymore. it lasted probably 20 seconds. very strange. we were both a little shaken afterwards.
content.summary: Zig-zagging  bright object at least as far out as a sattelite.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from kelowna british columbia canada after picking up a load of newspapers. as i was driving along the road ,i noticed a peculiar light beside and above my vehicle. i couldn't register in my mind the distant of the object.My first impression was that it was an aircraft, but it just "hung" motionless above my vehicle.It was very strange. at one point i pulled over to the side of the road and got out.I even motioned to other motorists to look up,but no-one seemed too interested to stop. i continued on my way ,every so often to look up, and still the object stayed above my vehicle.I travelled about 220 km or approx 140 miles.I was probably 15kms from my stop when the object started moving. i was astonished at the rate it went,faster than a jet in the sky, and then suddenly it took off over the horizon at an alarming rate of speed.I told my publisher at the time, when i arrived. the next day i was reading  a newspaper and was surprised to notice a reuters short about a crowd of people in tokyo who witnessed observing an objectin the sky and dropping over the horizon at a high rate of speed.

  i was indeed happy that somebody finally noticed.
content.summary: Noticed a very bright light  above highway on my way home

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out about 10:45 in to the back yard when i seen a bright yellowish light about 200 feet up in the sky moving very slow east to west it made no noise i wacth it untill it when behind some trees.I have seen alot of things at night sky in the last year around here.Have you had a lot of reports for this area or im i seeing things????????/email me let me know.......
content.summary: Bright yellowish  light

content.detailedDescription:
On holidays, i continue my search for ufos.

installed my canon powershot s80 camera on a tripod to film for 3-4 minutes at the landscape at a film speed of 15 fps.

on second 40, the object flies along the path transversally to the shot (app. 1 sec.)

i only realized about the object after processing the film on my tv set at home.

this is the clearest sighting made of many made in santiago, chile after following the same process of filming to the landscape.

there are many more backing up this type of sightings. the video clip is also available (200 mb), the jpg image belongs to a screenshot of the film.

i wait for comments and future sharing of ideas...

jorge
content.summary: 4 minute filming at puclaro dam at: lat=-29.9958333333, lon=-70.8611166667

content.detailedDescription: Ivywild area, colorado springs approx 3:00 p.M. 1976 or 77.  i was playing outside with my friend james, he looked up and said, "what's that?" i looked where he was pointing, and i saw 5 white, round objects, they were flying in an irregular, wobbly manner. they flew into a cloud, and about 1 second later, three of them flew out the other side. they flew around the cloud in the same manner as the first 5, for about 3 seconds, then into the cloud. the cloud was n.E. of us, approx above cheyenne mountain. james said he thought they were u.F.O.S, i had never heard of u.F.O.S. we watched them for 7-10 min, they kept flying into and out of the cloud, we got bored and went back to playing. later that night, it was dark outside, and my mom told me and james to take out the trash. the dumpster was about 25 yards away. about half way to dumpster, there was very bright flash of white light, it seemed to be focused on my yard. james and i stopped in our tracks, he said, "what was that?" i said, "i do'nt know". we were both pretty scared, we ran to dumpster, threw in the trash,and when we turned around to run back to the house, i saw the same 5 white lights we had seen earlier. we ran back to the house, my mom was sitting near the window, i asked her if she had seen the light,she said she did not. the next day, i asked our next door neighbors if they had seen the light, they did'nt see it either.
content.summary: White spheres flying into cloud, re-emerging

content.detailedDescription:
Sat outside because it was hot. one of u noticed a shooting star so layed on the table looking upwards. suddenly said 'what the...' and pointed upwards. 2 orbs that looked very high up were moving left to right, backwards and forwards almost as if they were playing with each other, they then suddenly took one direction and disappeared. we had no idea what the lights were as the movement was like nothing we could explain. 

we couldn't believe what we had watched as both of us dont know of any machine that can move around like that. to say we were a little freaked out would be an understatement.
content.summary: 2 orbs, changing direction backwards, forwards, left & right then right into the distance & disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It all started back in april when i saw some strange balloons that would move in strange ways and sometimes disappear. i made a few reports about them here at mufon. i kept seeing them, sometimes as a balloon and sometimes as a light in the sky. i tried to talk to them in my mind and sometimes i thought i heard them answere me. then in june i went on vacation to marbella spain. the night before i left i went out on my balcolny and looked up into the night sky and i saw small points of light move flash and disappear, i told them i was leaving to spain and asked them to come with me. then i went to bed and as i lay in bed i heard a voice say "we will come". then while i was on vacation i would see the same points of light at night move and flash and disappear,and one night i heard a voice say "you have to help us find more people like yourself, people who can help us" and i asked, help you do what? and the voice said "help us make this world a better place" and i asked, how would you make this world a better place and the voice said "make your people become more like us" i asked for more clarfication but the voice just kept repeating the same thing. when i returned back to southern california i decided that i must have invented the voice in my mind and that it was all imaginary. then one day about three weeks ago i was folding laundry and i heard a voice say "you are very important to us" and i said to the voice that i'm just talking to myself and the voice said "no you are talking to us and if you come outside right now you will see us and know that you are talking to us" so i went out and stood in front of my garage and looked up into the sky and saw nothing but i heard the voice saw "wait and you will see us, you have to be calm to hear us and patient to see us" and after a few minutes a small pink light appeared in the sky and i took some pictures (the first posted with this report) then another white and somewhat larger light appeared below the pink one (second photo posted) then i went back inside and sat in the bathroom where it's quiet and tried to listen to them and the voice said the same thing i had heard in spain about finding more people like myself and i told them my wife would never believe this (i had told her about the balloons and she had not believed me)and the voice said to bring my wife outside when she got home and they would show themselves to her so that she would believe me. so when she got home i told her what had happened and took her outside to see them (along with a pair of bioculars) and we stood in the same spot i had before and i told them in my mind that we were ready and after a few minutes a small white light appeared above us and i gave the binoculars to my wife so she could see them better (third photo posted) and she agreed that it was quite amazing. so i told them in my mind that i would introduce them to my father who used to work for the government and that he would be a better person to help them. so the next day i flew to washington dc but when i saw my father a voice said in my head not to tell him about them and that i was in danger and had better leave the capital right away because other bad aliens were trying to "scan" me. and then things started to get really strange (maybe i'll write a book about it if i live long enough) and i left my dads house(leaving him with the impression i had totally lost mind)and spent three days running for my life trying to get back home to so cal. and the voice started telling my to do things like "swallow your tongue" and other things that would do serious injury to myself and to make very long story short my oddessy ended with me punching a cop at lax and being locked up on a 5150 at ucla medical center. i was diagnoised as haveing a "psychotic episode" anyway i just wanted to tell other people who might be seeing strange balloons that they probably are more than just balloons and if you want to talk to them you probably can, but i warn you that, ignorance is bliss.
content.summary: I heard a voice in my head.

content.detailedDescription:
I was by myself watching tv.

suddenly did i felt like i should give birth.

i wasn't pregnant but i felt anyway i should give birth.

i lay me down at the floor with pillows behind my knees.

but i started to bleeding so much so i had to go and standing in the bath-tub. i had no cramp or pain.

and out from me come two after birth plasmas ! they were grey purple and big as a mans hands so i think it was 9 month birth plasma.

i lay it in a plastic bag with water and when my husband come home in the morning i said that he had to take me to the hospital.

the doctor checked me out and said he couldn't see i have been pregnant and thought it was menstruation bleeding.

in his office did i gave him the plastic bag and asked him if i haven't given birth. he was shocked and send it to research but i never heard back from them again.
content.summary: No ufo, an event

content.detailedDescription: I,am sorry i have to start over as just as i finished this my computer crashed and i lost everything, as we walk down dirt road a strong gust of wind came and as fast stopped when i looked up there was this thing in the middle of the road, my grandfather picked me up and told me not to be afraid, no one was going to hurt us, at the time i did,nt know the meaning of what he just, until later in my life, as we stood there 3 people came toeards us one went stright to my grandfather and sain something i did not understand and i asked papa what he said and papa said it was the old talk from were he and grandma came from, then he said i was to go with this man and he and i papa were going in side to look around i was not afraid i don,nt know why but i really felt no fear. as we went in side the man walked over to a small shelf a took this ring with red and blue lites on it and put it on my head and then he talked to me and i understood everything he said, i could feel the craft was moveing but it was so soft a move i had to ask him if we were moving and he said for quite some time would i like to look around with him thats when i noticed papa was not with us  and i asked him where he was and he said with friends and would be with us soon, i told him i wanted to grow up and be a pilot some day and he took me to this big room where it made a load humming noise he said this was what made his plane fly called forced magneect pluse energy i asked him where he came from and he said between his time and ours that they are a good people and one day i would understand but not now the we went up this hall way into anther room and i told him could i have something to drink and he gave me this water that was diffrent but very good and he showed me if i pinched the glass in this spot watch what would happen i did and the glass turened cold i asked if i could keep it and he said no it had to stay here and then he said lets go to your grandfather, as we walked there where so many people walking around you had to stay next to wall so you didnt get stepped on, as i look back oner the years this was a huge craft as long as a football field, all the people there looked like us then i say papa and he took me into his arms and took this thing i had on my head off and gave it to the man i had been with, the net thig was i felt a bumb and papa and i walked on to the dirt road but it was very dark out papa turned to me and said never tell anyone about this or he would go to jail and my mom and dad to i could only talk to him and if i need to i was to say papa will you read me a book just the i noticed this thing was gone and we stared to walk when a car came up yhe road and the man asked if he was samule johnson he said yes and he started talking i found them i found next there were cars coming from every were, as the years went by my papa and i talked a lot but some things he would not answer just befor his passing he told me not to worry that i was going to see somthing so wonderful it would change my life, until now i have honorned his wish but iam getting older and i felt i needed to tell some one i have so much more to tell but i just dont know if anyone would belive me i wish i could talk to some one like stan freid man thank you for aleast readind this
content.summary: Old rpt: grandfather & child ce4: ufo and two beings in farm field

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't knew anything about god or the bible and i had a nice and comfort life when i become abductioned of a ufo in 1994.

i was hanging out at my window,leaning on my arms and look out at our meadow and it was a clear blue and high air night. the stars was shining bright on the clear darkblue sky.

i felt it was someone looking at me and as i lived far out from the city with no close neighbour was it a strnge feeling.

i looked were i felt it come from and looked up on our roof and there it was , it was so black so it was a huge different from the darkblue sky and the black triangle spaceship.

then i fins myself laying with my back in the windows and my body half out in the window and my nose up to the sky.

i was lifted up and i tried to look in the windos of the spaceship but it was only dark the windows and i try to find anumber or text on it.

i was use with airplane because we had an military airport 7 km from where we lived.

then did i come back to stand in the window just before it happen but i felt it was a time-wall i had coming out from, the sound from my tv and my daughter and her father in the next room was the same.

next day did we wake up early of sounds like heavy traffic.

not of wheels but sound of wind when something is going very fast in the air.

it took some minutes for me to get up as it was about 7 in the saturday morning and we wanted to sleep longer.

i looked in the same window like the last night and i told my husband it was much cars going up in the forest so he had to see it too.

we started to watch tv but my husband was curious as he had lived in the village for 15 years so he said " i can't understand who has so big 50ths birthday party.

it's only 10 families in the village so he and our daughter drove up in the forest.

they come back and said they didn't met or saw any cars and at the road the drove on ends in th forest and then do you need to turn back the same way.

the cars was all metallic gray and it was at least 300 car driving up there.

i know where the mothership was because after the abduction was i frigthen to go to a special area in the forest when i picked mushrooms.

i wasn't interested of airplanes or nasa but after did i joined the military and become a sergeant in the airforce.

and i joined a club for ham-radio amatours and learn me that they surfing on the stars and moon for to reach a longer distance. and what it was that evening when i become abducted it was a clear blue sky and full moon and full of stars. it was in october

i breaked up 1997 with my husband and later that year did i met and married a man in texas and i come to find out that my husbands parents had been working for nasa their whole life inside nasa in their office in florida.

my mother-in-law did the drawings on their space maps.

my parents-in-law died the same year i become married in texas but i was visiting nasa

1999 did we moved from texas when my husband become fired from his job.

but in august 2000 when my husband was in texas did god come down to my daughter and me.

he was talking from the air, we never saw a body.

my daughter joined a church next day and have been working for god since then.

god make me leaving my husband and go back to usa for 3 and half year.

and after god come down have i seen some of the characters in the bible and they have been talking to me.

i find out that i had got a mark in my forhead of god because it a spot i never had before that you can't see but sometimes do it bleeding maybe twice a year and it amazing me that it's the same amount of blood all the time.

people ask me why i am bleeding but i can't feel it and the blood never reach my nose or are dripping as it is very thick dark blood. i say it's thorn of christ crown

i am 100% sure that god and ufo are together but i don't know how.
content.summary: Black,no sound,standing still in the air,no light on,no number or text on the spaceship.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my tent while out camping with some high school buddies of mine you know partying...When all of a sudden one of the girls my buddy brought accidentally kicked me in the side while running away from a large egg shaped floating and glowing object in the sky,.I sat there staring at it in fear, for what felt like 30-4omin, but when i finally relized what it was i was so freaked out and waking everyone up i forgot that it might be dangerous. so i told everyone to run and hide but by that time it was slowly moving towards us, although none of us knew if it had caught site of us yet.We waited awhile hoping it would fly away .As soon as looked up there was a very bright light shining in my face...From then on i can not remember anything but sirens from an ambulance my buddy johnny called for me,but he refused to tell me what happened and thats when i passed out. i woke up the next morning with an acing arm and when i looked down to see what was wrong i had a strange injury on my arm.Thats as much as i remember that is of importance except that no body knew how the cut got there... maybe i fell while running away to hide and just no one noticed.
content.summary: It was at least 30 feet in length and glowing green, it just sat there

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was talking inside to my boyfriend, the door was open.
2.  from the corner of my eye i saw something that grabbed my attention.  it was moving in a strange motion and was a yellow light.
3. when i first noticed it i thought it was a roller coaster in the distance and a local amuzement park, paying attention, it was making a movement that seemed to be consistent.
4.  i disregarded it thinking it was a park ride and then noticed it again from the corner of my eye and saw that it was making movements that were not consistent and thought it was not a ride at all.  it was going in a fast and irratic pattern that was not a helicopter or any type of aircraft i have ever seen.  (later, when i called the denver police, they forwarded me to the denver dia dispatch who said that denver police was reporting a possible helicopter)
5. frustrated.  after trying to talk to authorities such as the denver police and faa i was caught in a run around without verification of a possible issue and left to feel kinda cooky.
6. we left to get a closer look, with no luck due to the tree line as it was close to the ground (closer than the planes taking off that we could see in the distance.)  when we got back, the cloud cover had moved down and the sky was no longer clear.
content.summary: Erratic movement

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were out in the backyard and saw a flying saucer
content.summary: Saw a flying saucer over my apartment building

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side looking for shooting stars when i noticed a star that appeared to be moving i thought at first i thought i was seeing things so i closed my eyes for about 10 seconds and the moving object was not in the same area as i first saw it..I got my wife and she witnessed it also she has never seen a shooting star so she wrote it off as just that i told her shooting stars dont appear like that.. my mother inlaw was also out side looking for shooting stars ( she lives 30 min from us ) and she stated she saw the same thing i did..
content.summary: Looked like a flying star

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck, facing in a southeasterly direction, on the night of friday, august 10, 2007, at approximately 10:15 p.M., talking on the phone with a friend who lives in san angelo, texas. i live just a few miles west of tyler, texas.  my friend and i live approximately 350 miles apart from one another.

i noticed pinpoints of light, similar in size to the stars, moving in irregular patterns; some faster than others. this was not the first time i have seen these lights, but it was the first time that my husband was home. i called him to come outside.

i told my friend to look to the east/northeast sky so she could see them, too.  though i could not measure distance, it was quite apparent these pinpoints of light were not within our atmosphere.  my husband came out to look, he saw one and then went back inside.  my friend and i, however, continued to watch.

one of the lights would appear in one place, track slowly and irregularly off in a northeasterly direction and seemingly disappear. after a very few minutes, it would reappear in the same 'starting' spot and track off in a slightly different direction. this continued; however, after about 10 minutes, there was a very bright flash and about one second later, one of the pinpoint lights was going very rapidly across the sky from the direction of the bright flash (as its starting point).  after the fast one flew its course, another and then another of the slower ones appeared; one seemed to make some kind of turn because the light of it intensified about 10 times briefly before it turned again and became the 'normal' amount of light.

shortly after the light of the one intensified, my friend made a sound of surprise and said "did you see that?!" i told her i didn't see anything different and she said "no, it's something huge and it looked like it let out a pink cloud-looking stuff like an emission system or something." we continued to watch the pinpoints of light move. the most i saw at one time was 4 or 5.

about 5 minutes after my friend's exclamation, something huge passed overhead. i cannot accurately measure the distance of it, i can say, without hesitation, that it was flying lower than the airplanes fly. it appeared to be a very dark grey color and, had someone not been watching, it likely would have passed over completely undetected. it made no sound at all. it showed no lights that i could see. the shape of it is difficult to describe, but it was somewhat the shape of a boomerang; more accurately (and this is the only way i can accurately describe it), imagine that you are looking up watching a hawk on a wind current. remove the head of the hawk and all portions of the body below the wings: that is closer to the shape of what this huge thing looked like.

if i am anywhere close to judging the size of it, based on how close it appeared it might be, i would say that each side had to have been about the length of a football field.

it was though it was just gliding through the air. as i said, no sound at all. there were no lights showing, either.

when i described it to my friend on the phone, she said that was exactly the large thing she had seen that had emitted the pink "cloud."

i don't know what any of that was. as i said, it is not the first time that i've watch the pinpoints of light move randomly and slowly. it was however, the first time i have seen the huge thing.

i would be interested in knowing if anyone else saw what i have described or anything similiar last night, 8.10.07, between approximately 10:15 p.M. and 11:30 p.M. and possibly knows what it is.  thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Star-sized points of light in night sky tracking slowly in erratic pattern followed by very large flying object
